item.title: Pattern library annotations, documentation, and more
item.description: What started out as a simple chat at Netcel this afternoon between myself and our designer Cheryl on the ways in which we could integrate functional specifications into pattern libraries spawned into a great discussion on the topic via an impromptu Google Hangout.

item.title: Phases and Atomic Design: Phase One
item.description: As a follow up to my recent post on Phases (and Mesophases) - a possible addendum to Atomic Design I recently released the first addition to Brad Frost’s Pattern Lab to allow quick switching between defined breakpoints.
item.author: Ben Edwards

item.title: Phases (and Mesophases) - a possible addendum to Atomic Design
item.description: This Monday I had the absolute pleasure of attending Brad Frost’s Reasons to be Responsive workshop (Recap by Jake Ryan). Among the 8 ‘awesome’ hours of RWD gold, Brad introduced us to Atomic Design, a modular approach to responsive design and development, and his brand new tool Pattern Lab for forging websites using the Atomic Design approach.
item.author: Ben Edwards
